page.title: 07COMPUTERS IN CARNFORTH
page.content: The last decade has witnessed increasing growth in computer use both in industry and commerce and in the home. Out of the firms we questioned, {46.16%}use computers. The first firms to use them were{Nat. West. Bank, {Barclays Bank and Savant,}Nat. West. having had theirs 20 years. Most Estate Agents/Bld.Soc., Insurance off. and solicitors use them. They are least used in shops where there is currently very little interest . The introduction of computers has neither lost nor created jobs in Carnforth. A survey in school shows that out of 200 children{61(30.5%)}had computers which were mainly used for games. Business computers were used mainly for accounts, wages, orders and issuing tickets for B.R.{Christ Church School} has 3 disk driven B.B.C computers all bought within the last nine months.
